meanings.definition: A person or thing that brands.
meanings.sent1: The branders at the company create logos and slogans.
meanings.sent2: The branders worked hard to establish the company's image.
meanings.sent3: The branders decided to have a team-building day to come up with new ideas.
meanings.sent4: The branders were like artists, painting the company's identity.
meanings.sent5: The branders' work was crucial in making the business stand out.

meanings.definition: A tool used for branding livestock.
meanings.sent1: The rancher used branders to mark his cattle.
meanings.sent2: The branders were heated and pressed onto the animals' skin.
meanings.sent3: The branders were accidentally left out in the sun and got too hot to handle.
meanings.sent4: The branders sizzled as they seared the ranch's emblem onto the cows.
meanings.sent5: The branders left a permanent mark on the livestock.

meanings.sent1: The rancher would branders his cattle for identification.
meanings.sent2: She carefully branders each product with the company logo.
meanings.sent3: He branders his initials on all his belongings to prevent mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: The memory was branded in his mind like a hot iron.
meanings.sent5: The experience branders itself into his memory, never to be forgotten.
